bioconda.name: bioconductor-aims
bioconda.summary: AIMS : Absolute Assignment of Breast Cancer Intrinsic Molecular Subtype

biotools.summary: This package contains the necessary functions to assign the five intrinsic molecular subtypes (Luminal A, Luminal B, Her2-enriched, Basal-like, Normal-like). The assignments could be done on individual samples as well as on dataset of gene expression data.

bioschemas.name: AIMS
bioschemas.summary: This package contains the necessary functions to assign the five intrinsic molecular subtypes (Luminal A, Luminal B, Her2-enriched, Basal-like, Normal-like). The assignments could be done on individual samples as well as on dataset of gene expression data.
